body.directions: Listen to the audio, then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: In what situation will you be using the phrase in the audio?
body.answer: When you are at the cashier at a store
options: When you turn in work to your teacher in class
When you receive a phone call from a friend
When you leave your parents for school in the morning
body.correct: Job wonderfully done! 多少钱 duōshǎo qián means “how much,” and it’s used when you are ready to pay at places such as a store or restaurant.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the phrase again, and think about its meaning, as well as in what places or situations you can use such a phrase.

body.quiz: Which of the following has the same initial as the 2nd character of the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 巧克力 qiǎokèlì
options: Audio for 午餐 wǔcān
Audio for 松饼 sōngbǐng
Audio for 现金 xiànjīn
body.correct: Fabulous job! The 2nd character in the word 价钱 jiàqián (price) has initial “q;” so does the 1st character in the word 巧克力 qiǎokèlì (chocolate).
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio again, identify the initial, and then compare it with the four options on the list.

body.quiz: Which of the following is a method to complete the action described by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Awesome job! 付钱 fùqián means “to pay,” and a credit card is a good way to complete this action, instead of a simple 谢谢 xièxiè (thanks).
body.incorrect: So close! Listen to the word several times. Keep in mind to differentiate it from other words you’ve learned in this group, as several of them have the same character(s). Then, consider what is needed in order to complete that action.

body.quiz: Where do you most likely use this phrase in the audio?
body.answer: At the table in a restaurant
options: At the cashier in a store
At the counter of a bank
body.correct: Excellently done! 买单 mǎidān (to pay the bill) is specifically used for paying the bill at a restaurant, but not in other locations.
body.incorrect: So close! Listen to the word several more times. Understand its meaning, and then consider in what situations it can be used.
